code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:8080/api/auth/";var register=function register(prenom,nom,email,adresse,phone,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signup",{prenom:prenom,nom:nom,email:email,adresse:adresse,phone:phone,password:password});};var login=function login(email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",{email:email,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.accessToken){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));};var getAllUser=function getAllUser(){return axios.get(API_URL+"getAllUser");};var remove=function remove(id){return axios.delete(API_URL+"".concat(id,"/deleteUser"));};export default{register:register,login:login,logout:logout,getCurrentUser:getCurrentUser,getAllUser:getAllUser,remove:remove};
